Greetings all, I am looking into the mei of a new tsuba. It is signed 
????=
?, which reads Kish=FB J=FB Sadanobu according to Nihonto Koza but is 
also=
 read as Kish=FB J=FB Teimei in the book Tsuba Kanshoki by Dr. Torigoye 
Ka=
zutaro .

? can be pronounced both as Sada and Tei and ? reads as both Nobu=
 and 
Mei, both are correct, so which one is right ?

Sadanobu/Teimei is a =
tsuba artist from the Kii provence.

Cheers

Rich Turner
